channel.title: Adding Skillcapes problem, Player.java won't compile please help!

item.title: Adding Skillcapes problem, Player.java won't compile please help!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

You don’t really need that. Did you make a backup? Because if you did. Put it back again.
I have most of the silabcapes, and silabhood working for the new codes.

Capes.

public static int capes[] = { 14073, 14074, 14076, 14077, 14089, 14090, 14092, 14093, 14095, 14096, 14098, 14099, 14101, 14102, 14104, 14105, 14107, 14108, 14110, 14112, 14113, 14115, 14116, 14117, 14119, 14120, 14122, 14123, 14125, 14126, 14127, 14128, 14131, 14132, 14134, 14135, 14137, 14138, 14140, 14141, 14143, 14144, 14146, 14147, 14148, 14560, 14561, 14079, 14080, 14082, 14085, 14086 };

Hoods.

public static int hats[] = { 14075, 14078, 14081, 14084, 14087, 14090, 14093, 14096, 14099, 14102, 14105, 14108, 14111, 14114, 14117, 14120, 14123, 14126, 14129, 14131, 14134, 14137, 14140 };

item.title: Adding Skillcapes problem, Player.java won't compile please help!
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Ok I was adding the tut for Hoods and Skillcapes and changed evertything like it said but I can’t compile. 1 Error, I tried changing stuff but doesent work.

Player.java:640: cannot find symbol symbol : method isHelm(int) location: class Item if (!Item.isHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipme nt[playerHat])) { ^ Note: * uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2007, 09:03:17 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know?

This is my code

if (!Item.isHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat])) { playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pHead); // head } else { playerProps.writeByte(0); } if (playerEquipment[playerHands] > 1) { playerProps.writeWord(0x200 + playerEquipment[playerHands]); } else {
